explains: n. 检察官，公诉人；（刑事庭的）原告律师
wordGroup: public prosecutor 检察官；公诉人
chief prosecutor 首席检察官，主任检察官；检察长

sentences.en: A report by the state prosecutor described the police action as confused and disorganized.
sentences.cn: 州检察官的报告将警方的行动描述成混乱和缺乏组织的。

sentences.en: The prosecutor told the judge in mitigation that the offences had been at the lower end of the scale.
sentences.cn: 公诉人对法官说这些罪行情节较轻，希望能够从宽判决。

sentences.en: His chances do not seem good in view of the fact that the Chief Prosecutor has already voiced his public disapproval.
sentences.cn: 鉴于首席检察官已公开表示反对这一事实，他的机会看起来不好。
